title: why can't I send or receive pictures in text mesages
content: I received purchase a pixel 2 phone and I cannot send or receive photos.  I had no trouble when I had my LG Nexus phone.  I and several others have tried all of the suggestions to remedy this issue and nothing works.  Can someone help.  I can get regular text messages just not pics.  Even downloaded a different messenger app and it still doesn't work
